entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
